-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | support for embroidery formats in haskell
--   
--   This package allows you to read and view PES embroidery files used in
--   commercial machine embroidery. Writing new files is currently not
--   supported.
@package embroidery
@version 0.1

module Codec.Binary.Embroidery
importPES :: FilePath -> IO (Either String EmbFile)
displayRendering :: EmbFile -> IO ()
parsePES :: Parser EmbFile
instance Eq Stitch
instance Show Stitch
instance Eq StitchBlock
instance Show StitchBlock
instance Eq EmbFile
instance Show EmbFile
